<Text: Kermit Blosser Ohio Athletics Hall of Fame:  Since 1965, inductees to the Blosser Ohio Athletics Hall of Fame are inducted during banquet ceremonies the evening prior to a designated home football game.>

<Text: Kermit Blosser Ohio Athletics Hall of Fame:  Inductees are also honored into perpetuity as their portrait and accomplishments are displayed in the Ohio Athletics Hall of Fame currently located in the Convocation Center.>
